import React from "react"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import Header from "../../components/Header"; import { Button, ButtonContainer } from "./style"; const Home = () => { return (

User Registration

Users can register on the website using their email address and password. After registration, they are authenticated and can access the features of the website.

Image Submission

Authenticated users can upload pictures of their skin affected by psoriasis. The images will be stored on the server-side. Users provide a description and body positions for the image.

Image Management

Authenticated users can view a list of their uploaded images, update them, and delete them. They can also filter the images based on the date and body positions.

Clinical Feedback

Users can authorize clinicians to view their uploaded images. Authorized clinicians can access the images and provide feedback to the patients. Multiple clinicians can be authorized to view the same patient's images. Clinicians can leave textual feedback for the patient.

Image Security

All images are encrypted using a secure mechanism so that they can only be viewed by the patient and authorized clinicians. The website employs security measures such as SSL/TLS encryption, secure password storage, and two-factor authentication.

Future Enhancements

  • Implement a feature to allow users to share their images with others for research or educational purposes, with their consent.
  • Be able to relate a new image to a previous one to follow the clinical evolution of a given patient (timeline).
); }; // ter acesso ao ficheiro dentro do componente export default Home;
